Verses: 1 annaatkalil Ulagamengum Kudimadhippu Ezhudhappadavendumendru Akusdhuraayanaal Kattalai Pirandhadhu.
2 seeriyaa Naattile Sireniyu Enbavan Dhesaadhipadhiyaayirundhapodhu Indha Mudhalaam Kudimadhippu Undaayitru.
3 andhappadi Kudimadhippezhudhappadumpadikku Ellaarum Thangal Thangal Oorgalukkup Ponaargal.
4 appozhudhu Yoseppum, Thaan Dhaaveedhin Vamsaththaanum Kudumpaththaanumaayirundhapadiyinaale, Thanakku Manaiviyaaga Niyamikkappattuk Karppavadhiyaana Mariyaaludane Kudimadhippezhudhappadumpadi,
5 galileyaa Naattilulla Naasareththoorilirundhu Yoodheyaa Naattilulla Bethlagem Ennum Dhaaveedhin Oorukkupponaan.
6 avvidaththile Avargal Irukkaiyil, Avalukkup Pirasavakaalam Nerittadhu.
7 aval Than Mudharperaana Kumaaranaippetru, Saththiraththile Avargalukku Idamillaadhirundhapadiyinaal, Pillaiyaith Thunigalil Sutri, Munnanaiyile Kidaththinaal.
8 appozhudhu Andha Naattile Meyppargal Vayalveliyil Thangi, Raaththiriyile Thangal Mandhaiyaik Kaaththukkondirundhaargal.
9 avvelaiyil Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Avargalidaththile Vandhu Nindraan, Karththarudaiya Magimai Avargalaich Sutrilum Piragaasiththadhu; Avargal Migavum Bayandhaargal.
10 dhevadhoodhan Avargalai Nokki: Bayappadaadhirungal; Idho, Ellaa Janaththukkum Migundha Sandhoshaththai Undaakkum Narseydhiyai Ungalukku Arivikkiren.
11 indru Karththaraagiya Kiristhu Ennum Ratchakar Ungalukkuth Dhaaveedhin Oorile Pirandhirukkiraar.
12 pillaiyaith Thunigalil Sutri, Munnanaiyil Kidaththiyirukkakkaanbeergal; Idhuve Ungalukku Adaiyaalam Endraan.
13 andhakshaname Paramasenaiyin Thiral Andhath Thoodhanudane Thondri:
14 unnadhaththilirukkira Dhevanukku Magimaiyum, Boomiyile Samaadhaanamum, Manusharmel Piriyamum Undaavadhaaga Endru Solli, Dhevanaith Thudhiththaargal.

15 dhevadhoodhargal Avargalai Vittup Paralogaththukkup Ponapinbu, Meyppargal Oruvaraiyoruvar Nokki: Naam Bethlagem Oorukkup Poi, Nadandhadhaagak Karththaraal Namakku Arivikkappatta Indhak Kaariyaththaip Paarppom Vaarungal Endru Solli,
16 theeviramaai Vandhu, Mariyaalaiyum, Yoseppaiyum, Munnanaiyile Kidaththiyirukkira Pillaiyaiyum Kandaargal.
17 kandu, Andhap Pillaiyaik Kuriththuth Thangalukkuch Sollappatta Sangadhiyaip Pirasiththampanninaargal.
18 meypparaale Thangalukkuch Sollappattadhaik Ketta Yaavarum Avaigalaikkuriththu Aachchariyappattaargal.
19 mariyaalo Andhach Sangadhigalaiyellaam Than Irudhayaththile Vaiththu, Sindhanaipanninaal.
20 meyppargalum Thangalukkuch Sollappattadhinpadiye Kettu, Kanda Ellaavatrirkaagavum Dhevanai Magimaippaduththi, Thudhiththukkondu Thirumpipponaargal.
21 pillaikku Viruththasedhanampannavendiya Ettaam Naalile, Adhu Karppaththile Urpavikkiradharku Munne Dhevadhoodhanaal Sollappattapadiye Adharku Yesu Endru Perittaargal.
22 moseyin Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadiye Avargaludaiya Suththikarippin Naatkal Niraiverinapodhu,
23 mudharperaana Endha Aanpillaiyum Karththarukkup Parisuththamaanadhennappadum Endru Karththarudaiya Niyaayappiramaanaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi Avaraik Karththarukkendru Oppukkodukkavum,
24 karththarudaiya Niyaayappiramaanaththil Solliyirukkirapadi, Oru Jodu Kaattuppuraavaiyaavadhu Irandu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu Baliyaagach Seluththavum, Avarai Erusalemukkuk Konduponaargal.

25 appozhudhu Simiyon Ennum Perkonda Oru Manushan Erusalemil Irundhaan; Avan Needhiyum Dhevabakthiyum Ullavanaayum, Isravelin Aarudhal Varakkaaththirukkiravanaayum Irundhaan; Avan Mel Parisuththa Aavi Irundhaar.
26 karththarudaiya Kiristhuvai Nee Kaanumunne Maranamadaiyamaattaai Endru Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Avanukku Arivikkappattumirundhadhu.
27 avan Aaviyin Evudhalinaal Dhevaalayaththile Vandhirundhaan. Yesu Ennum Pillaikkaaga Niyaayappiramaanamuraimaiyinpadi Seyvadharkuth Thaai Thagappanmaar Avarai Ulle Konduvarugaiyil,
28 avan Avaraith Than Kaigalil Endhikkondu Dhevanai Sdhoththiriththu:
29 aandavare, Umadhu Vaarththaiyinpadi Umadhu Adiyenai Ippozhudhu Samaadhaanaththode Pogavidugireer;
30 purajaadhigalukkup Piragaasikkira Oliyaagavum, Ummudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelukku Magimaiyaagavum,
31 dhevareer Sagala Janangalukkum Munbaaga Aayaththampannina
32 ummudaiya Ratchaniyaththai En Kangal Kandadhu Endraan.
33 avaraikkuriththuch Sollappattavaigalukkaaga Yoseppum Avarudaiya Thaayaarum Aachchariyappattaargal.

34 pinnum Simiyon Avargalai Aaseervadhiththu, Avarudaiya Thaayaagiya Mariyaalai Nokki: Idho, Anegarudaiya Irudhaya Sindhanaigal Velippadaththakkadhaaga, Isravelil Anegar Vizhukiradharkum Ezhundhirukkiradharkum, Virodhamaagap Pesappadum Adaiyaalamaavadharkum, Ivar Niyamikkappattirukkiraar.
35 un Aaththumaavaiyum Oru Pattayam Uruvippogum Endraan.

36 aaserudaiya Koththiraththaalum, Baanuvelin Kumaaraththiyumaagiya Annaal Ennum Oru Theerkkadharisi Irundhaal; Aval Kannippiraayaththil Vivaagamaanadhumudhal Ezhuvarusham Purushanudane Vaazhndhavalum, Adhiga Vayadhusendravalumaayirundhaal.
37 erakkuraiya Enbaththunaalu Vayadhulla Andha Vidhavai Dhevaalayaththai Vittu Neengaamal, Iravum Pagalum Ubavaasiththu, Jebampanni, Aaraadhanai Seydhukondirundhaal.
38 avalum Anneraththile Vandhu Nindru, Karththaraip Pugazhndhu, Erusalemile Meetpundaaga Kaaththirundha Yaavarukkum Avaraikkuriththup Pesinaal.
39 karththarudaiya Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Sagalaththaiyum Avargal Seydhu Mudiththapinbu, Galileyaa Naattilulla Thangal Ooraagiya Naasareththukkuth Thirumbipponaargal.
40 pillai Valarndhu, Aaviyile Belankondu, Gnaanaththinaal Niraindhadhu. Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyum Avarmel Irundhadhu.
41 avarudaiya Thaai Thagappanmaar Varushandhorum Paskaa Pandigaiyil Erusalemukkup Povaargal.
42 avarukkup Pannirandu Vayadhaanapodhu, Avargal Andhap Pandigaimuraimaiyinpadi Erusalemukkuppoi,
43 pandigainaatkal Mudindhu, Thirumbi Varugirapodhu, Pillaiyaagiya Yesu Erusalemile Irundhuvittaar; Idhu Avarudaiya Thaayaarukkum Yoseppukkum Theriyaadhirundhadhu.
44 avar Pirayaanakkaararin Koottaththile Iruppaarendru Avargal Ninaiththu, Orunaal Pirayaanam Vandhu, Uravinmuraiyaaridaththilum Arimugamaanavargalidaththilum Avaraith Thedinaargal.
45 kaanaadhadhinaale Avaraith Thedikkonde Erusalemukkuth Thirumbip Ponaargal.
46 moondru Naalaikkup Pinbu, Avar Dhevaalayaththil Podhagar Naduvil Utkaarndhirukkavum, Avargal Pesukiradhaik Ketkavum, Avargalai Vinaavavum Kandaargal.
47 avar Pesakketta Yaavarum Avarudaiya Puththiyaiyum Avar Sonna Maaruththarangalaiyunguriththup Piramiththaargal.

48 thaai Thagappanmaarum Avaraikkandu Aachchariyappattaargal. Appozhudhu Avarudaiya Thaayaar Avarai Nokki: Magane! En Engalukku Ippadichseydhaai? Idho, Un Thagappanum Naanum Visaaraththode Unnaith Thedinome Endraal.
49 adharku Avar: Neengal En Ennaith Thedineergal? En Pidhaavukkaduththavaigalil Naan Irukkavendiyadhendru Neengal Ariyeergalaa Endraar.
50 thangalukku Avar Sonna Vaarththaiyai Avargal Unarndhukollavillai.
51 pinbu, Avar Avargaludane Koodappoi, Naasareththooril Serndhu, Avargalukkuk Keezhppadindhirundhaar. Avarudaiya Thaayaar Indhach Sangadhigalaiyellaam Than Irudhayaththile Vaiththukkondaal.
52 yesuvaanavar Gnaanaththilum, Valarththiyilum, Dhevakirupaiyilum, Manushar Dhayavilum Adhigamadhigamaai Viruththiyadaindhaar.
